attributes.action: No school uniform in the uk
attributes.additional_details: So children do not have to go through the same boring Turing steps of putting on the same clothes everyday. Also children may not be able to afford 2 or more trousers shirts and jumpers.
attributes.background: Stop school uniforms for all UK schools

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259
